short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save all of your favorite brand clothing in one place with the click of a button!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remember that newly released pair of sneakers you found on Nike? 
How about that cute dress on Amazon that's been in your cart all month?
It's a hassle trying to keep track of every retail item you find online.  You'll open countless tabs only to eventually close and forget about most of them.

FuturFits solves this problem for you.

With just the click of a button, FuturFits allows you to save any retail item from anywhere on the internet to one place.
We consolidate all those open tabs on your browser. Just click "save" on our extension and then continue shopping. It's that easy!
Every item that you save is automatically stored to your wishlist on our website, www.futurfits.com, free for you to view, compare, or purchase whenever you want.

Start saving and never lose track of products you love again!
